sub_title: Program Manager at Royal Philips; CEO & Founder of WineRocks for Friends, Executive Chef at Culinary Guild Brabanconne
summary: Experienced Global Program Manager with a demonstrated history of working in the medical device industry. Skilled in Program & Project Management, Research and Development (R&D), Product Development and Medical Device Regulations. Strong program and project management professional with a MSc and PhD in Geology /  Materials Science from Utrecht University.

education.grade: "Doctoraal" (Master of Science) cum laude in 1989; PhD in 1995

school.name: Gymnasium Sorghvliet, the Hague, the Netherlands

education.field_of_study: Mathematics I & II, Physics, Chemistry; English, German, Dutch, Greek

profile_positions.title: Industrial Transitions Program Manager at Philips Integrated Supply Chain - Personal Health

profile_positions.description: Global program management of an industrial footprint transition program to transfer MR coil production, non-design R&D, service & repair, and supporting functions from Gainesville (FL, USA) to Pune (India).
profile_positions.title: Industrial Transitions Program Manager at Philips Integrated Supply Chain

profile_positions.description:
Global program management of two industrial footprint transitions:
1. transfer of MR RF coil production, non-design R&D, service & repair, and supporting functions from Gainesville (FL, USA) to Pune (India); concentration of MR RF coil design R&D and advanced development in Gainesville (FL, USA) by transfer of MR RF coil design R&D from Pewaukee (WI, USA) to Gainesville (FL, USA). To be completed early 2022.
2. transfer of X-ray generator R&D and supporting functions from Shenyang (China) to Hamburg (Germany) and Suzhou (China). Completed December 2019.

Program management of two product development programs in Gainesville (FL, USA):
1. MR digital & analog receive chain reliability and RoHS compliance improvement .
2. 510k and technical file remediation.
profile_positions.title: Program Manager at Philips Imaging Components

profile_positions.description:
Definition of three integral programs on MR digital & analog receive chain reliability improvement and RoHS compliance in Gainesville (FL, USA)
Program management of supply and service chain development teams for MRI scanners
Program management of Techncial Centers of Expertise (CoE) across Philips
profile_positions.title: Program Manager at Philips Innovation Services

profile_positions.description: Program management of global product development team for the Vereos digital PET-CT medical imaging system
profile_positions.title: Program Manager at Philips Innovation Services

profile_positions.description: Program management of global product development team (60 fte) for an interventional X-ray medical imaging system
profile_positions.title: Integral Project Manager at Philips Image Guided Therapy Systems

profile_positions.description:
Management of global development team (25 fte) for medical imaging systems maintenance big data analytics solution, project with Philips Healthcare Imaging Customer Services.
Management of advanced development team for feasibility testing of an abutted MR-PET medical scanner; project with Philips Healthcare MR in Best, the Netherlands.
Management of integral product development team (22 fte) for design, realization and testing of hardware, firmware, software and production tooling to support the development of the Vereos digital PET-CT medical scanner; project with Philips Healthcare AMI in Cleveland (USA).
Definition of an integral project between Philips Research and Philips Healthcare MR and Advanced Molecular Imaging (AMI) to develop an integrated digital MR-PET medical scanner.
Expansion of the “Stargate” reference model for product co-creation with four additional phases for Research and a new Q&R row for Philips Group Innovation; basis of idea to market (I2M).
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager at Philips Research

profile_positions.description:
Design, realization and testing of solar modules using multi-crystalline silicon wafers and back contact solar cells; joint project with Energy research Centre of the Netherlands (ECN) for Sunergy Investco, a subsidiary of the Dutch multi-utility and energy company Delta.
Realization and testing of magnetic particle spectrometers to characterize contrast agents based on superparamagnetic iron oxides for magnetic particle imaging; joint project with Bruker Biospin (Ettlingen, Germany).
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager at Philips Applied Technologies

profile_positions.description:
Management of integral project management group and project support office (10 employees). Responsibility for harmonization of way of working on project management and product creation within Philips Applied Technologies; e.g. implementation of ISO13485 compliant project management procedure, PMI based project plan, standard SharePoint project site, and training of system architects using “Stargate” reference model for product creation.
Definition of a platform and roadmap for three EU funding projects on new radiation detectors and image processing software for functional medical imaging for Philips Healthcare resulting into 9 Meuro subsidy for Philips Healthcare over three years.
Definition of four EU funding and Dutch High Tech Top projects on image guided intervention (and therapy) and on acute / in-vitro diagnostics for Philips Healthcare and Philips Corporate Technologies resulting into 10 Meuro subsidy for Philips over one year.
profile_positions.title: Group Manager Integral Project Management at Philips Applied Technologies

profile_positions.description:
Implementation of “Stargate” reference model for product creation across all Philips product divisions (sectors); launched during Philips Innovation Excellence Days 2007 in Andover (USA).
Product concept creation and feasibility study into new LCD TV backlights; business case assessment leading to cost reduction program and business restructuring.
Product concept creation study into new high power X-ray anodes for cardiac CT scanners; joint project with Philips Research (Aachen, Germany), Philips Healthcare (Hamburg, Germany) and Snecma Propulsion Solide (Bordeaux, France).
Product concept creation and feasibility study into new burners for ceramic discharge metal halide (CDM) lamps; joint project with Philips Lighting (CDL/Lightlabs, PDLC) and Philips Research. Formulation of integral project plan for creation of new CDM lamp platform.
Process investigation into laser scribing – breaking of X-ray detector panels and mobile or PC monitor display panels for Trixell, Philips Healthcare (Biometrix), Philips Mobile Display Systems (Heerlen, The Netherlands) and LG.Philips LCD (Gumi, Korea); joint projects with Schott Advanced Processing (Mainz, Germany).
Process investigation into mechanical scribing – breaking of mobile display panels for Philips Mobile Display Systems (Shanghai, China); joint projects with Mitsuboshi (Osaka, Japan) leading to industrial release of new processes, equipment and testing tools.
Design and industrial release of equipment for edge grinding of mobile display panels for Philips Mobile Display Systems (Shanghai, China).
Advanced competence development domain leader: technology roadmap definition for glass, ceramics & silicon and system-in-package (SiP); industrial advisory board member of Netherlands Institute for Metals Research (NIMR), support to definition of Dutch innovation program for high tech materials (M2i).
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager / Senior Technologist at Philips Applied Technologies
